languages.text: "Мы следуем процедуре, Ваша Светлость. Устав велит проявлять к черни предельную твердость, чтобы мерзавцы не покрывали друг друга перед законом".

"We're following procedure, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The regulations dictate the use of extreme force when dealing with the rabble so that the scoundrels do not cover up each other's transgressions."
languages.original_text: "Мы следуем процедуре, Ваша Светлость. Устав велит проявлять к черни предельную твердость, чтобы мерзавцы не покрывали друг друга перед законом".

traits.locale_text: "We're follow procedure, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The regulations dictate the use of extreme force when dealing with the rabble so that the scoundrels do not cover up each other's transgressions."
traits.speaker: YetAnotherEnforcer

languages.text: «Seguimos el protocolo, mi{mf|lord|lady}. El reglamento indica que debemos emplear la fuerza extrema al lidiar con esta chusma para que estos rufianes no se cubran las espaldas».
languages.original_text: "We're following procedure, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The regulations dictate the use of extreme force when dealing with the rabble so that the scoundrels do not cover up each other's transgressions."

traits.locale_text: «Seguimos el protocolo, mi{mf|lord|lady}. El reglamento indica que debemos emplear la fuerza extrema al lidiar con esta chusma para que estos rufianes no se cubran las espaldas».
traits.speaker: YetAnotherEnforcer

languages.text: 「手順に従っています、陛下。連中を相手にするときは加減せず武力を使うよう規定されているので、悪党どもはお互いの犯罪行為を庇い合うことはできないでしょう」
languages.original_text: "We're following procedure, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The regulations dictate the use of extreme force when dealing with the rabble so that the scoundrels do not cover up each other's transgressions."

traits.locale_text: 「手順に従っています、陛下。連中を相手にするときは加減せず武力を使うよう規定されているので、悪党どもはお互いの犯罪行為を庇い合うことはできないでしょう」
traits.speaker: YetAnotherEnforcer

languages.text: “我们都是在照章办事，大人。根据船上的条例规定，对付乌合之众必须采取极端程度的暴力，这样那些人渣才不会互相包庇。”
languages.original_text: "We're following procedure, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The regulations dictate the use of extreme force when dealing with the rabble so that the scoundrels do not cover up each other's transgressions."

traits.locale_text: “我们都是在照章办事，大人。根据船上的条例规定，对付乌合之众必须采取极端程度的暴力，这样那些人渣才不会互相包庇。”
traits.speaker: YetAnotherEnforcer

languages.text: "Wir befolgen das Protokoll, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Die Regularien schreiben im Umgang mit dem Gesindel den Einsatz extremer Gewalt vor, damit sich die Täter nicht gegenseitig decken."
languages.original_text: "We're following procedure, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The regulations dictate the use of extreme force when dealing with the rabble so that the scoundrels do not cover up each other's transgressions."

traits.locale_text: "Wir befolgen das Protokoll, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Die Regularien schreiben im Umgang mit dem Gesindel den Einsatz extremer Gewalt vor, damit sich die Täter nicht gegenseitig decken."
traits.speaker: YetAnotherEnforcer

languages.text: « Nous ne faisons que suivre la procédure habituelle, Votre Seigneurie. Face aux criminels, le règlement préconise l'usage de la force extrême de manière à dissuader les coupables de se couvrir mutuellement. »
languages.original_text: "We're following procedure, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The regulations dictate the use of extreme force when dealing with the rabble so that the scoundrels do not cover up each other's transgressions."

traits.locale_text: « Nous ne faisons que suivre la procédure habituelle, Votre Seigneurie. Face aux criminels, le règlement préconise l'usage de la force extrême de manière à dissuader les coupables de se couvrir mutuellement. »
traits.speaker: YetAnotherEnforcer

languages.text: "Prosedüre uyuyoruz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Mevzuat, ayaktakımıyla baş ederken aşırı güç kullanımını emrediyor. Bu sayede o alçaklar, birbirlerinin ihlallerini örtbas edemiyorlar."
languages.original_text: "We're following procedure, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The regulations dictate the use of extreme force when dealing with the rabble so that the scoundrels do not cover up each other's transgressions."
